sense.def:
Kadar ceste ali črte
converge
, se srečajo ali združijo.

seg.quote: The paths converge under the trees.

sense.def:
Kadar osebe ali vozila
converge on a place
, se pomikajo proti nekemu kraju iz različnih smeri.

seg.quote: The guards converged on her and flung her to the ground.

sense.def:
Kadar zamisli ali družbe
converge
, postopoma postajajo podobne druga drugi.

seg.quote: Two radically different types of society were converging.
There was some convergence of views.
